content.text: Pretty good. Just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event.
Sounds fun. I wish I could go back to school.
It's not too late! I'm starting working for myself so I can be more flexible with my time and still be able to take care of my toddler.
That's awesome! I love that you're so dedicated to your family.
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
I bet! I don't have any kids, but I can only imagine.
It's definitely a different kind of stress, but it's so rewarding.
I bet it is. I'm sure your kiddo is really lucky to have you.
Aww, thank you. That means a lot.
You're welcome! So what are you doing for fun these days?
I love to listen to music while I work in my flower shop. It helps me get in the zone.
That sounds really relaxing. I love listening to music too.
Me too! What kind of music do you like?
I like a little bit of everything, but I'm really into classic rock right now.
Oh, that's cool! I love classic rock too.
Great! We should start a band!
That would be so much fun
